frontmatter.title: Work with data using queries in Ballerina
frontmatter.keywords: query expressions, language integrated queries, programming language, getting started
frontmatter.description: Learn how to use Ballerina query expressions to filter, sort, and join different iterable collections.
frontmatter.intro: This guide will walk you through using query expressions (a.k.a. language integrated queries) on data to filter, sort, and join with different data sets to produce new data.
